subject: Automobile Racing
Automobile Safety Features and Defects
Deaths (Fatalities)
lead_paragraph: In the wake of Dan Wheldon’s death last Sunday, IndyCar officials have been all but silent, and after canceling their championship banquet, left Las Vegas trailing bitterness and finger-pointing.
snippet: In the wake of Dan Wheldon’s death last Sunday, IndyCar officials have been all but silent, and after canceling their championship banquet, left Las Vegas trailing bitterness and finger-pointing.
